Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 to you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit your operations or personal endeavors. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $10,800. This is an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a discounted rate, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
